definition: to sing and dance/general term for a round dance

sentences.english: Tage is an ancient artistic form of dancing and singing.
sentences.chinese: 踏歌是人類創作的一種古老的歌舞藝術形式。

definition: to sing/to recite
to sing loudly/to lift one's voice in song
reed-pipe wind instrument and vertical bamboo flute
to go for a walk in the moonlight
qin and se, two string instruments that play in perfect harmony/marital harmony
to dance/to wield/to brandish
musical sound/flowing rhythm (of poetry)/cadence
antiphon (i.e. solo voice answered by chorus)/sung reply (in agreement with first voice)/to reply with a poem in the same rhythm

feast/goblet
